Re: License #: CB530246146
Dear Ms. VanHouten:
Attached is the Interim Inspection Report for the above referenced agency completed on
07/21/2025. The inspection has determined substantial compliance with applicable
licensing statutes and rules.
Please review the enclosed documentation for accuracy and contact me with any
questions. In the event that I am not available and you need to speak to someone
immediately, please contact Samantha Way, Area Manager, at 517-243-9743.
Sincerely,
Douglas Turrill, Licensing Consultant
701 S. Elmwood
Traverse City, MI. 49684

III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS
The agency is in compliance with all applicable rules and statutes.
IV. TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE
The facility was offered technical assistance in the following areas:.
• Technical assistance was not requested or required.
V. CONSULTATION
The facility was offered consultation in the following areas:
• Consultation was not requested or required.
VI. EVALUATION OF PERIOD UNDER REVIEW
There were no substantiated incidents of maltreatment in care during this licensing
period.
There were no incidents of substantiated corporal punishment during this licensing
period.
Corrective Action Plan Compliance
The agency has not been required to submit any corrective action plans during
this period under review.
2

Chief Administrator Assessment
The Chief Administrators Assessment was reviewed. The agency was not cited for
any rule violations during the 2024 renewal audit therefore a review of a CAP for
compliance did not occur. The Chief Administrator reported there are no barriers
to providing services for community youth.
Financial Overview
The agency annual budget and a current certified public accountant audit were
reviewed. No concerns were noted.
Staff and Youth Interviews
The Chief Administrator was interviewed and reported the agency is doing well in
serving youth in the community. The Chief Administrator reported there were no
barriers to providing community youth with services.
Description of Agency Walk Through
The agency is located in a modern building in Ludington. There are other social
service agencies located in the building. The agency has sufficient office space.
VII. FIELD ANALYST FINDINGS
The agency is non contracted and is not licensed to certify foster homes.
VIII. RECOMMENDATION
Based on inspection findings the agency is in compliance with all applicable
licensing statutes and rules. It is recommended that the agency continue on their
regular license.
August 1, 2025
